thread.title: Trump‚Äôs Morning Twitter Rant Inspired A Fresh Stream Of ‚ÄòGolden Shower‚Äô Jokes
thread.title_full: Trump‚Äôs Morning Twitter Rant Inspired A Fresh Stream Of ‚ÄòGolden Shower‚Äô Jokes

author: Stacey Ritzen
title: Trump‚Äôs Morning Twitter Rant Inspired A Fresh Stream Of ‚ÄòGolden Shower‚Äô Jokes
text:
Getty Image
Oh boy, now we‚Äôve done it, he mad. Donald Trump is so mad . On top of reports yesterday that U.S. intelligence obtained evidence of compromising information linking his presidential campaign to Russia, that particularly salacious (yet still unsubstantiated claim) was revealed by Buzzfeed about Trump‚Äôs penchant for prostitutes and ‚Äúgolden showers‚Äù ‚Äî making the president-elect a laughing stock on top of literally being accused of committing treason .
Even if the leaked information turns out to be inaccurate, the damage is already done. Twitter exploded in jokes Tuesday evening , causing Trump to lash out in an uncharacteristic ALL CAPS rant . And after having slept on it, Trump appears to still be pretty fired up about the whole thing, unleashing a brand new ‚Äústream‚Äù of tweets Wednesday morning.
Russia just said the unverified report paid for by political opponents is "A COMPLETE AND TOTAL FABRICATION, UTTER NONSENSE." Very unfair!
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 11, 2017 
Russia has never tried to use leverage over me. I HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH RUSSIA ‚Äì NO DEALS, NO LOANS, NO NOTHING!
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 11, 2017 
I win an election easily, a great "movement" is verified, and crooked opponents try to belittle our victory with FAKE NEWS. A sorry state!
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 11, 2017 
Intelligence agencies should never have allowed this fake news to "leak" into the public. One last shot at me.Are we living in Nazi Germany?
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 11, 2017 


Did‚Ä¶ Did he make his own golden shower joke at the end, there? What is even happening anymore? The internet is truly eating itself. Regardless, the angrier Trump gets, all it seems to do is throw more gasoline on the fire (or urine on the prostitutes, as you will), and #GoldenShowerGate was still the top trending hashtag on Twitter as of this morning. This is literally Trump‚Äôs worst nightmare, and it doesn‚Äôt seem like it‚Äôs going anywhere anytime soon.
Putin: Excellent. We have him where we want him. Now we play the waiting ga‚Äî
BuzzFeed: LEEEEROY JENKINS
‚Äî Cuffy (@CuffyMeh) January 11, 2017 
"Sorry I can't read you a book tonight, sweetie. I'm Tweetin' about piss!" 
‚Äî one of my daughter's memories of me when she's older.
‚Äî Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) January 11, 2017 
Phrasing. https://t.co/RESHmx6LQZ 
‚Äî Christian Long (@cuneform) January 11, 2017 
I'm going to be a "wiz" as President. #GoldenShower #GoldenShowerGate 
‚Äî PEEOTUS (@GoldenHitler) January 11, 2017 
The man who rose to political power spreading a fake news scandal about Obama says he is a victim of a fake news scandal. #GoldenShowerGate 
‚Äî Keith Boykin (@keithboykin) January 11, 2017 


if you think donald trump is having a rough day someone woke up in that bed this morning
‚Äî k e e t ü•î (@KeetPotato) January 11, 2017 
Who takes seriously unsubstantiated anonymous claims, anyways? #GoldenShowerGate pic.twitter.com/S1AZyM8fQX

Rehearsals for @realDonaldTrump 's inauguration are going well. #GoldenShowerGate pic.twitter.com/zQFV3Q6CcZ

Paying hookers to pee on a bed is a great prelude to choosing a cabinet to shit on America. @realDonaldTrump #GoldenShowerGate

Prostitutes, treason & a stolen election ‚Ä¶ 
Or, henceforth‚Ä¶ 
TWO GIRLS, ONE COUP #GoldenShowerGate

Trump: *looks in bathroom* 
Not what I meant! #GoldenShowerGate pic.twitter.com/9SBtHH8CDD
